channel.title: 2024 PAX West on Exo Archive
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 PAX West on Exo Archive

item.description:
Kirb your enthusiasm

HINT:   Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.  

HINT:   Inhale, exorcise  

ANSWER:   Ghost Kirby
item.content:
Kirb your enthusiasm

HINT:   Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.  

HINT:   Inhale, exorcise  

ANSWER:   Ghost Kirby

item.description:
Perhaps some espresso could cure this.

HINT:   Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.  

ANSWER:   Depresso
item.content:
Perhaps some espresso could cure this.

HINT:   Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.  

ANSWER:   Depresso

item.description:
His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days.

ANSWER:   Olimar
item.content:
His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days.

ANSWER:   Olimar

item.description:
Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders.

HINT:   _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl  

HINT:   🍌  

ANSWER:   Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble
item.content:
Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders.

HINT:   _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl  

HINT:   🍌  

ANSWER:   Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble

item.description:
He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage.

HINT:   His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.  

ANSWER:   Remy
item.content:
He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage.

HINT:   His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.  

ANSWER:   Remy

item.description:
They coexist with humans! Uh you gotta go less fast… NO they don’t. Yea, actually they do.

HINT:   Well that escalated… at the speed of sound.  

ANSWER:   Sonic in Jurassic Park
item.content:
They coexist with humans! Uh you gotta go less fast… NO they don’t. Yea, actually they do.

item.description:
HINT:   Believe it or not, PAX wasn’t made by game developers.  

HINT:   Well Actually… Jerry and Mike did technically end up designing a game with Hothead and Zeboyd. :nerd:  

ANSWER:   Yoshi
item.content:
HINT:   Believe it or not, PAX wasn’t made by game developers.  

HINT:   Well Actually… Jerry and Mike did technically end up designing a game with Hothead and Zeboyd. :nerd:

item.description:
Same yellow shirt. Same annoying voice. Same Know-It-All. Different Platform.

HINT:   Do you know what kind of train this is? Well, do you?  

HINT:   ðŸ»â€â„ï¸ ðŸš† ðŸ’¨

item.description:
Everlasting and ancient, but do you even have a drop of knowledge about its history? If so, that could Quel’ your thirst.

HINT:   Actually a… .  

HINT:   Sometimes being subversively literal is funny. The answer is so obvious, it will leave you saying wow.  

ANSWER:   Well of Eternity
item.content:
Everlasting and ancient, but do you even have a drop of knowledge about its history? If so, that could Quel’ your thirst.

HINT:   Actually a… .  

HINT:   Sometimes being subversively literal is funny. The answer is so obvious, it will leave you saying wow.

item.description:
“Every Key to this puzzle is logically sound. And I will quietly die on this hill.”

HINT:   Actually, it is literally sound.  

HINT:   That’s not the type of key I was expecting.  

ANSWER:   Piano Puzzle
item.content:
“Every Key to this puzzle is logically sound. And I will quietly die on this hill.”

HINT:   Actually, it is literally sound.

item.description: ANSWER:   Necromancy of Thay
item.content: ANSWER:   Necromancy of Thay

item.description:
Its consumable is so bomb, you know it’s made by dark magic. Maybe even the devil herself.

HINT:   Usually it’s the blast that gets ya, but this miasma is nasty!  

HINT:   Corpses have been used like this for generations, but the 4th gen chefs put a dark and deadly twist on it this time.  

ANSWER:   Blighted Corpse Explosion
item.content:
Its consumable is so bomb, you know it’s made by dark magic. Maybe even the devil herself.

HINT:   Usually it’s the blast that gets ya, but this miasma is nasty!  

HINT:   Corpses have been used like this for generations, but the 4th gen chefs put a dark and deadly twist on it this time.  

ANSWER:   Blighted Corpse Explosion

item.description:
He can equip the book, but no need just let him cook. An expert of consumption, you know he’ll have you hooked.

HINT:   Using coins to unlock this hint, is an absolute abomination.  

HINT:   2003 to now, he is ironically unchanged.  

ANSWER:   Pudge
item.content:
He can equip the book, but no need just let him cook. An expert of consumption, you know he’ll have you hooked.

HINT:   Using coins to unlock this hint, is an absolute abomination.  

HINT:   2003 to now, he is ironically unchanged.  

ANSWER:   Pudge

item.description:
I am already chained up, freedom? No thanks. Hit me and I’m yours. Corpse + _____ = Success.

FREE HINT: ðŸ§Ÿ ðŸ§ƒ

HINT:   With gentle hands and a heart of a fighter I’m a Survivor.  

ANSWER:   Zombie Juice

HINT:   Socially distanced, but not unseen.  

HINT:   VOD Review!  

ANSWER:   Rotten Flesh

Redacted, Australia, PAX Online, Minion_00143, 11:01

HINT:   Socially distanced, but not unseen.

item.description:
You know this. No other team can help you answer this better than yourself.

HINT:   Don’t overthink this, look in my eyes.  

HINT:   Be less humble.  

ANSWER:   [your team’s name]
item.content:
You know this. No other team can help you answer this better than yourself.

HINT:   Don’t overthink this, look in my eyes.  

HINT:   Be less humble.  

ANSWER:   [your team’s name]

item.description:
Cool guys don’t look at explosions, LEGENDARY guys drive through them.

HINT:   Caused by an angelic code.  

HINT:   The stores were absolutely Flooded by fans to reach this moment.  

HINT:   Ride the land mammal Forward Unto Dawn.  

ANSWER:   Warthog Run
item.content:
Cool guys don’t look at explosions, LEGENDARY guys drive through them.

HINT:   Caused by an angelic code.  

HINT:   The stores were absolutely Flooded by fans to reach this moment.  

HINT:   Ride the land mammal Forward Unto Dawn.  

ANSWER:   Warthog Run

item.description:
Now mostly nostalgic, but a powerhouse of joy that stood strong once upon a time. I can still hear it clear as day.

HINT:   Pre If i could Cast spells, I would enchant you with Dreams of a simpler time.  

ANSWER:   Sega
item.content:
Now mostly nostalgic, but a powerhouse of joy that stood strong once upon a time. I can still hear it clear as day.

HINT:   Pre If i could Cast spells, I would enchant you with Dreams of a simpler time.  

ANSWER:   Sega

item.description:
The wheels of time they echo, your destiny will not let go. You and I express our lives and our worries fade from our falsetto.

HINT:   I wear a size 8 wheel.  

HINT:   The tension should be cut with a paper knife.  

HINT:   They should be less Humble, as this Bundle of joy was a great success.  

ANSWER:   Wandersong
item.content:
The wheels of time they echo, your destiny will not let go. You and I express our lives and our worries fade from our falsetto.

HINT:   I wear a size 8 wheel.  

HINT:   The tension should be cut with a paper knife.  

HINT:   They should be less Humble, as this Bundle of joy was a great success.  

ANSWER:   Wandersong

item.description:
Gilded plumage to fly to a bird’s peak, and friends made along the way.

HINT:   Taylor and Sue could play out one of Aesop’s Fables.  

ANSWER:   A Short Hike
item.content:
Gilded plumage to fly to a bird’s peak, and friends made along the way.

item.description:
PAX

HINT:   Not “one of”… THE.  

ANSWER:   Power Glove
item.content:
PAX

HINT:   Not “one of”… THE.  

ANSWER:   Power Glove

item.description:
You have no rights! I can go willy-nilly, hold my gloves.

HINT:   I am the OG, no wand or wizardry can suppress me now.  

HINT:   No royalties, No Kingdom. You would be like me too. BE AFRAID ha HA!  

HINT:   Come hell or high water… Screw it, I’ll give ya both! ha HA! ðŸ­  

ANSWER:   Captain Willie
item.content:
You have no rights! I can go willy-nilly, hold my gloves.

HINT:   I am the OG, no wand or wizardry can suppress me now.  

HINT:   No royalties, No Kingdom. You would be like me too. BE AFRAID ha HA!  

HINT:   Come hell or high water… Screw it, I’ll give ya both! ha HA! ðŸ­  

ANSWER:   Captain Willie

item.description:
HINT:   Said to be inspiration for the rework of arguably one of the most renown videogame villains.  

HINT:   It has not always looked exactly like this, you could say it was reborn. Less Kingdom Hearts, more Dark Souls.  

HINT:   This is your Final hint. I will not be making 16.  

ANSWER:   Vincent Valentine
item.content:
HINT:   Said to be inspiration for the rework of arguably one of the most renown videogame villains.  

HINT:   It has not always looked exactly like this, you could say it was reborn. Less Kingdom Hearts, more Dark Souls.  

HINT:   This is your Final hint. I will not be making 16.  

ANSWER:   Vincent Valentine

item.description:
My hero is an athlete, their abilities are truly transformative. Always on the ball and will fight for me. A true G.

ANSWER:   Glover
item.content:
My hero is an athlete, their abilities are truly transformative. Always on the ball and will fight for me. A true G.

ANSWER:   Glover

item.description:
Make sure to use it in the courts, otherwise your electronics might short!

HINT:   Gloves more commonly known to assist in catching a ball, not many known for creating them.  

HINT:   Don’t be a Goob about it.  

HINT:   This one doesn’t wreak Havoc like the other.  

ANSWER:   Charge Glove
item.content:
Make sure to use it in the courts, otherwise your electronics might short!

item.description:
Some fans believe he should get more attention in his original medium. He definitely didn’t get a boatload of it in this one.

HINT:   Lost in the woods on this one? Broaden your horizons and discover what you might sea.  

HINT:   To embark his path on the straight and narrow, might be easier if you follow a Sparrow.  

HINT:   Not quite a commander.  

ANSWER:   Theodore Groves

item.description:
This location is the reason Knuckles never left Act 1.

HINT:   It’s a gated community.  

ANSWER:   Emerald Grove
item.content:
This location is the reason Knuckles never left Act 1.

item.description:
Define… Grove… And make it rinky.

HINT:   Let’s be mature about this answer… Or let’s not, the creator knew what they were doing using 2 euphemisms in one title.  

HINT:   1: Redacted _____ _____ Redacted Redacted.  

ANSWER:   Dink Smallwood

From now on, defenders of the grove will be ready to smite the evil where it strikes.

ANSWER:   Keeper of the Grove 3
item.content:
From now on, defenders of the grove will be ready to smite the evil where it strikes.

item.description:
You aren’t sure how or why… but you feel lesser. Insufficient. Ashamed.

HINT:   Click Reserve Items  

ANSWER:   Minion of the Month
item.content:
You aren’t sure how or why… but you feel lesser. Insufficient. Ashamed.

HINT:   Click Reserve Items  

ANSWER:   Minion of the Month

item.description:
Inanimate objects can get tired, which makes sense when that object is essentially you. Great idea…

HINT:   It will take a long time to get anywhere, it will be very annoying, but at least it’s pretty?  

HINT:   The developer is drowning in a bombardment of harsh reviews.  

HINT:   Chill out, harvest a coconut ya damn boat.  

ANSWER:   Skull and Bones
item.content:
Inanimate objects can get tired, which makes sense when that object is essentially you. Great idea…

HINT:   It will take a long time to get anywhere, it will be very annoying, but at least it’s pretty?

item.description:
Don’t Stress it, Jim’s virtually right with you on this one.

HINT:   If Jim himself headed a lab.  

ANSWER:   Bonelab
item.content:
Don’t Stress it, Jim’s virtually right with you on this one.

HINT:   If Jim himself headed a lab.  

ANSWER:   Bonelab

item.description:
Not everyone is as privileged to work for the Dr. But the desire remains to be on that #1 plaque. Even if the boss has no name and sounds like Kermit + Ray Romano.

HINT:   Talk to the boss. Pick up the task sheet.  

HINT:   It’s extremely literal, a non-gamer could answer this question.  

ANSWER:   Employee of the Month
item.content:
Not everyone is as privileged to work for the Dr. But the desire remains to be on that #1 plaque. Even if the boss has no name and sounds like Kermit + Ray Romano.

item.description:
THE dynamic duo.

HINT:   Royally meek, largely small, delusionally aware.  

ANSWER:   Sans and Papyrus
item.content:
THE dynamic duo.

HINT:   Royally meek, largely small, delusionally aware.  

ANSWER:   Sans and Papyrus

item.description:
An Offering of life, not quite the blood draw you had planned on. But with Jim’s cousin _____ inbound, you can’t be sure what hand you will be dealt.

HINT:   Not every Skeleton is a reaper, that’s a common stereotype. Be better.  

HINT:   Okay, this one is. Just luck of the draw really.  

ANSWER:   Necrobinder
item.content:
An Offering of life, not quite the blood draw you had planned on. But with Jim’s cousin _____ inbound, you can’t be sure what hand you will be dealt.

HINT:   Okay, this one is. Just luck of the draw really.  

ANSWER:   Necrobinder

item.description:
Fans wanted him to do a mask-off reveal way before YouTubers made it a trend. Exoskeleton? Well, kinda.

ANSWER:   Master Chief
item.content:
Fans wanted him to do a mask-off reveal way before YouTubers made it a trend. Exoskeleton? Well, kinda.

ANSWER:   Master Chief

item.description:
Not like it’s the end of the world. His comes off at times.

Hint:   Sometimes you just can’t be bothered to think of a cool creative name.  

Answer:   Doomguy
item.content:
Not like it’s the end of the world. His comes off at times.

item.description:
You didn’t think I would use him? It? Not quite the majority. Let’s call it 50/50.

HINT:   Promoted to: Ocarina of Dimensions.  

HINT:   You gotta beat the other guy in this version too. Yeah, you know the guy.  

ANSWER:   OOTMM

item.description:
JIM again?: You have activated my trap card! Kunai With Chain! And I summon Burning Skull Head.

HINT:   Sending someone to the shadow realm has never been this gruesome.  

ANSWER:   Scorpion

item.description:
Best described by the agility, heroics, impeccable driving, daredevil feats and his heart of gold. This legend wears many hats.

ANSWER:   Mario
item.content:
Best described by the agility, heroics, impeccable driving, daredevil feats and his heart of gold. This legend wears many hats.

item.description:
Not left behind, but abandoned. Exo Scrolls Syrin will not be.

HINT:   DOA(lpha)

ANSWER:   The Black Death

item.description:
More doctorates, less purpose. A glimpse into our past.

HINT:   They didn’t actually have doctorates back then, and patients couldn’t leave reviews. Ahh the good ol’ days.  

ANSWER:   Plague M.D.

Carmen is going on a trip of the psilocybin variety.

HINT:   Not even Carmen cared this much about hairdryers.
